Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.service.password

Interface IPasswordResetService

All Known Implementing Classes:
PasswordResetService
public interface IPasswordResetService
Interface defining the contract for password reset operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    User
    findUserByPasswordResetToken(String token, String password)
    Finds the user associated with a given password reset token.
    void
    requestPasswordReset(String email)
    Initiates a password reset request for the user with the specified email address.
    String
    resetPassword(String password, User user)
    Resets the password for the specified user.

  • Method Details

    • findUserByPasswordResetToken

      User findUserByPasswordResetToken(String token, String password)
      Finds the user associated with a given password reset token. Validates the token and ensures the new password meets required criteria.
      Parameters:
      token - the password reset token to validate
      password - the new password to set
      Returns:
      the User associated with the valid token
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the token is invalid or the password does not meet criteria

    • requestPasswordReset

      void requestPasswordReset(String email)
      Initiates a password reset request for the user with the specified email address. Generates a reset token and sends a notification.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the user requesting the password reset
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the email is invalid
      ResourceNotFoundException - if no user is found with the provided email

    • resetPassword

      String resetPassword(String password, User user)
      Resets the password for the specified user.
      Parameters:
      password - the new password to set
      user - the user whose password will be reset
      Returns:
      a success message indicating the password was reset successfully
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if an error occurs during the password update process
